REFERRED TO ETHICS AND INTERNAL GOVERNANCE

Title: Relates to requiring certain individuals to file financial disclosure forms
Summary: Requires certain individuals to file financial disclosure forms.
LawCode: Amd ยง73-a, Pub Off L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public officers law, in relation to requiring certain individuals to file financial disclosure forms
